sentences.en: Chester is what psychiatrists mean when they talk about unconditional love.
sentences.cn: 切斯特就是精神病学家所说的那种无条件的爱.
孩子们需要无条件的爱。

sentences.en: Heavenly heart means unselfish, natural, unconditional, fair and equal.
sentences.cn: 天心即大公无私, 是很自然 、 很无为 、 很公平的.

sentences.en: Most simple and subtle love, most unforgettable and unconditional happiness!
sentences.cn: 简单平淡的爱, 刻骨铭心的幸福!

sentences.en: My love for all my children is unconditional.
sentences.cn: 我对自己所有孩子的爱都是无条件的。

sentences.en: My loyalty to you will be unconditional.
sentences.cn: 我对您的忠诚是无条件的.

sentences.en: Oscar: The unconditional surrender of Germany has just been announced.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡: 刚刚宣布了德国无条件投降.

sentences.en: The " unconditional surrender " formula was announced by the President and the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 总统和首相宣布了 “ 无条件投降 ” 的定则.

sentences.en: The enemy were forced to make an unconditional surrender.
The leader of the revolt made an unconditional surrender early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天上午早些时候，反叛的首领无条件投降。

sentences.en: the unconditional release of all political prisoners
sentences.cn: 所有政治犯的无条件释放

sentences.en: the unconditional surrender of military forces
The victorious army demanded unconditional surrender.
sentences.cn: 胜方要求敌人无条件投降.

sentences.en: There are two forms of most - favored - nation treatment: conditional and unconditional.
sentences.cn: 最惠国 待遇有两种形式: 有条件的和无条件的.

sentences.en: They are the basis of unconditional prophecies, as opposed to conditional scientific predictions.
sentences.cn: 它们是无条件预言的根据, 而不是有条件的科学预测.

sentences.en: Yet Mr Hibell's love for his bikes was unconditional.
sentences.cn: 希贝尔对其坐骑的爱是无条件的.

trans.tran_cn: 无条件的，绝对的，无限制的，无保留的
trans.tran_en: not limited by or depending on any conditions
